version_description:
For a complete list of changes, visit the official Modern Combat Facebook page.

• Major balancing changes to each Agent!

• Gameplay changes including increased headshot damage, faster respawn timers, and a slower charge rate for Core Charges.

• Improvements to aim sensitivity.

• Additional tweaks to improve stability and performance.

Stay tuned for more updates and improvements coming soon: http://facebook.com/ModernCombat

CHANGELOG
• Matchmaking improvements to ensure fairer match-ups based on trophy count.

• Additional changes to Contracts, Crates, and the Black Market.

• New quality-of-life enhancements to improve the player experience during battle.

• Fixes for minor issues regarding achievements, voice overs, animations, and more.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

CHANGELOG
• Each map now supports 3 different control zone locations. The zone is randomly selected at the start of each game.

• Several balancing changes to M0NARK, GH0ST, SW1FT, and other agents.

• New quality-of-life enhancements and minor bug fixes.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

CHANGELOG
• Free crates! Earn a Free Crate containing Versus Coins and Agent XP every four hours.

• Several balancing changes to R0NEN, CREEPER, M0NARK, GH0ST, and SW1FT.

• New quality-of-life enhancements and minor bug fixes.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

CHANGELOG
• NEW Daily Crates! Play up to six matches per day to earn bonus rewards.

• NEW Agent Shop! Directly unlock Agents with Diamonds or Korpens, a brand-new currency. Earn Korpens on a daily basis just by playing matches.

• New quality-of-life enhancements and minor bug fixes.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

CHANGELOG
• Connection strength indicator and ping value are now displayed directly in-game.

• Various bug fixes and gameplay improvements.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

CHANGELOG
• New control options: shoot button, aim-down-sights button, and additional sensitivity settings.

• Several balancing changes to SW1FT, MI-NU, R0NEN, and GH0ST.

• Various bug fixes and gameplay improvements.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

CHANGELOG
• Matchmaking improvements to guarantee full 4 vs. 4 lobbies in multiplayer.

• Several balancing changes to MI-NU, GH0ST, TOWER, M0NARK, and KAN.

• New quality-of-life enhancements and minor bug fixes.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

CHANGELOG
• Bug fixes and minor improvements

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Stay tuned for more updates coming soon!

CHANGELOG
• Solo Play: Battle against AI bots and earn additional rewards per day.

• Win matches to earn Player XP. Reach new Player Levels to earn random Emblems for your Killsign.

• New achievements have been added. All rewards have been replaced with Korpens and Versus Coins.

• Connect with Facebook to back up your profile and transfer progress between devices!

• Major balancing changes to all agents!

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.

CHANGELOG
• League improvements: All leagues now have 3 tiers each. Platinum, Emerald, and Diamond leagues have also been added.

• Minor gameplay balancing changes to KAN, JUKE, M0NARK, and GH0ST. Health and damage multipliers have also been tweaked for upgraded agents.

• New local leaderboards! See how you rank against players in your country.

• Additional optimization, improvements, and bug fixes.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.

Welcome to the worldwide release of Modern Combat Versus!

REMEMBER – The warzone is your playground. Be an Agent of Chaos; be an Agent of change!

CHANGELOG
• Minor gameplay balancing changes to GH0ST, M0NARK, KAN, and CREEPER.

• Gameplay tweaks, including the ability to shoot through teammates and interrupt sprint by reloading.

• Additional optimization, improvements, and bug fixes.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.

Fan-favorite Kult is gearing up for Halloween with an awesome new skin and special event!  

Plus, additional improvements and bug fixes have also been implemented.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

BIG UPDATE! CHANGELOG:
• Clans have arrived! Connect with players, chat about strategy, and send daily gifts.

• New game mode: BOUNTY! Classic 4v4 team deathmatch with a twist.

• New agent: SEVEN! A brand-new specialist equipped with a sniper rifle and a team-based radar ability.

• Compete in Live Tournaments! Set up custom matches, invite friends, and choose the prize.

• New Master League and monthly ranked seasons with exclusive rewards!

• Special holiday content and event featuring Blaze, a fan-favorite agent.

• New agent skins, gameplay HUD, and various other improvements.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.
Various online performance improvements.

CHANGELOG
• Celebrate Lunar New Year with a new festive GH0ST skin, special event, and promotions!

• Group Play has arrived! Team up and play with your friends in online multiplayer.

• New Tournament Rules: Toggle all players' Agents to max level in Live Tournaments.

• Additional optimization, improvements, and bug fixes.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.
• Celebrate Easter with a brand-new skin for a fan-favorite agent! Complete the upcoming special event to unlock it!

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

• Minor balancing tweaks.
• Celebrate Easter with a brand-new skin for a fan-favorite agent! Complete the upcoming special event to unlock it!

CHANGELOG
• The largest Modern Combat Versus update is now available!

• NEW ultimate abilities: Unlock new abilities for each agent, featuring a secondary passive effect with extra bonuses!

• NEW specialist agent: HASHTAG. Hack enemies with a sidekick drone to temporarily disable their abilities during battle.

• NEW multiplayer map: CENTRAL! Drop into gritty neon-lit favelas featuring close-quarters nighttime combat.

• eSports Spectator Mode: Watch live tournaments, swap between player perspectives (3rd-person camera), and view real-time stats.

• Overhauled upgrade system: Acquire 22 new modifications per agent to increase health, damage, and ability power.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message. Plus, stay tuned for the release of new fan-favorite Agent skins!

CHANGELOG
• Customize your HUD! Move the shoot, aim, reload, and ability icons anywhere on the screen.

• Unlock the frame rate and achieve stunning 60 FPS gameplay!*

• NEW agent coming soon!

• NEW cosmetic items, including battle-worthy Agent Skins and 100+ emblems.

• Several bug fixes and improvements.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.

*Only available on specific devices.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

CHANGELOG
• NEW game mode: Warzone! Capture and control 3 zones to secure victory for your team.

• NEW agent: Cub! This attacker causes a boom on the battlefield with his rocket launcher ability.

• League revamp: Road to Glory! Gain trophies to progress through 100 sub-leagues and earn a variety of rewards.

• NEW skins: Fan-favorite agents are getting new designs, including a new golden skin.

• Minor gameplay balancing changes to Tower, Hashtag, Juke, and other agents.

• Several bug fixes and improvements.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.

CHANGELOG
Welcome to the Summer Championship update!

• NEW game mode: Team Deathmatch! The only thing that matters is getting the most enemy eliminations.

• NEW map: Stadium! Battle it out in an action-packed arena built for champions.

• NEW Agent skins: Represent your favorite countries with special national jerseys for each Agent!

• Pick up the new Super Charger item during gameplay to instantly regenerate health and core charges.

• Minor gameplay balancing changes to CUB, MI-NU, GH0ST, and other Agents.

• Several bug fixes and improvements.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.

CHANGELOG
• Two NEW skins for fan-favorite agents will release very soon! Stay tuned for special in-game events and promotions.

• Minor gameplay balancing changes to KULT, TOWER, REVOLV, and other Agents.

• Several bug fixes and improvements.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

CHANGELOG
This is the biggest update ever for MCVS. Plus, celebrate Halloween with special content!

• Discover the newest Agent, Sarge, and the new map, Aftermath!

• Celebrate Halloween: The first-ever Creeper skin, a special Central map, and spooky cosmetic items.

• Agent Gear: Collect & equip 5 tiers of gear to increase the passive stats of your Agents!

• Divisions: New competitive weekly leaderboards. Get promoted and earn rewards!

• 4,000 new cosmetic items including weapon camos, Agent outfits, and jerseys.

• New VIP program: Subscribe for 2x rewards, bonus items, exclusive gifts, and more!

• Tons of extra new features: Quick Chat, Mega Events, Arena Events, Daily Shop, and more!

• Improvements to level-up bonuses, spectator mode, menus, and more!

• Minor gameplay balancing of Agents, plus bug fixes and stability improvements.

For a full list of changes, check out the latest in-game Inbox message.
Fixed various errors and crashes.

Celebrate the holidays with a brand-new update and special content!

• 2 gold skins for fan-favorite Agents

• 18 holiday-themed weapon camos

• 10 festive Agent jerseys

• Various bug fixes and improvements
• Various bug fixes and improvements.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

CHANGELOG
• NEW Specialist Agent: WITCH. Support Agent who can potentially stun the whole enemy team with her ability.
• Career & Mastery extensions.
• Additional optimization, improvements, and bug fixes.

CHANGELOG
• NEW Specialist Agent: WITCH. Support Agent who can potentially stun the whole enemy team with her ability.
• Career & Mastery extensions.
• Additional optimization, improvements, and bug fixes.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

CHANGELOG
• Four NEW skins for fan-favorite Agents! Stay tuned for special in-game events and promotions.
• Minor gameplay balancing changes to Level-up bonus, Agents, League rewards, and upgrade chances for Tier-6 Gear.
• Several bug fixes and improvements.

CHANGELOG
- New mode: RANDOM AGENT ARENA.
- New HO-HO-HO BATTLE PASS.
- New Christmas skin for Blaze.

CHANGELOG
- New skin for M0NARK
- Several bug fixes and improvements

CHANGELOG
- New skin for KNOX
- Several improvements and bug fixes

CHANGELOG
- New shiny golden skin for Revolv.
- New character balancing to make your gameplay even better.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.

CHANGELOG
- New golden skin for KAN

CHANGELOG
- 7 new weapons! One for each of the following agents: Lock, Juke, Gh0st, M0nark, Seven, Kan and Hashtag.
- Weapon switch feature: Now you can change your weapon before the battle starts.
- Balance improvements: Reworked reload timers and fire rate, new weapon parameter, and much more!

CHANGELOG
- 7 new weapons! One for each of the following agents: Lock, Juke, Gh0st, M0nark, Seven, Kan and Hashtag.
- Weapon switch feature: Now you can change your weapon before the battle starts.
- Balance improvements: Reworked reload timers and fire rate, new weapon parameter, and much more!

CHANGELOG
- Three new weapons! Try out new guns for Witch, Revolv, and Sarge.
- Bug fixes

CHANGELOG
• Two new weapons! Try out Creeper's Silent Death and Tower's Wrecker.
• Weapon menu improvements.
• Balance changes to Agents.

A new agent boots up for battle!

Meet BLI-P, a medic robot programmed to keep allies alive and enemies in traction. Her protective V-Drone helps sustain teammates' health, while her poison rifle drains targets into submission. Download the update and join the battle now!

CHANGELOG
• New skin for Knox
• New gun for Knox
• Balance changes
• Bug fixes

CHANGELOG
• New skin for Cub
• Bug fixes

CHANGELOG
- New skin for Revolv.
- New skin for R0nen.
- New skin for Seven.
- Various improvements and bug fixes.
